job_title: Principal Supplier Process Engineer on PCBA
job_description: Principal Supplier Process Engineer When you're creating technology that drives human progress, everything needs to be spot on. Our Supplier Process Engineering team works with our suppliers to enable them to produce materials and components of the highest quality. Working closely with our product developers, we select and monitor vendors and suppliers who can meet our high engineering and quality standards. In addition, we perform regular auditing and undertake design and development engineering assignments to develop new products or update existing products. We’re also experts in establishing systems and procedures to enhance overall quality. Join us to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact as a Principal Supplier Process Engineer on our GSQE Team in Taiwan. As a member of the Supplier Quality Engineering, you will be responsible for new Tech development, supplier quality management to hit quality metrics and sustain COS . This job requires strong process knowledge, rich practical experience, excellent communication, influencing skills and project management skills. What you’ll achieve As a Principal Supplier Process Engineer, you will be responsible for supplier quality management to hit quality metrics and sustain Continuity of Supply . You will: Work cross-functionally with Engineering, Operations, Marketing, Procurement, Technology Providers, Dell suppliers, Regional Dell Factories, and other Dell functions for product launch. Develop and manage project schedules for new PCBA product in the Dell line of business. Drive quality improvements by eliminating sources of defects in the design, new product introduction, and supplier manufacturing processes. Evaluate supplier performance and drive process improvement and operational results against program goals & metrics Manage program risks and issues, and drive issues to closure as well as provide executive level updates on all program deliverables Take the first step towards your dream career Every Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table. Here’s what we are looking for with this role: Essential Requirements Detailed PCBA materials and SMT process knowledge Proficient in advanced quality management tools such as First Article inspection , Statistical process control , design failure mode and effects analysis , 6-Sigma/BPI, and design of experiments , etc. Problem-solving skills to provide solutions to technical issues involving the design or manufacturing of components and systems. Executive presentation skills 9+ years work experience in engineering mgmt., quality, or related technical function with Bachelors / Master in Engineering is preferred. ​ Desirable Requirements Experience leading cross-functional teams and Strong English and Command Skills, to lead the decision-making process across multiple areas of the business. Who we are We believe that each of us has the power to make an impact. That’s why we put our team members at the center of everything we do. If you’re looking for an opportunity to grow your career with some of the best minds and most advanced tech in the industry, we’re looking for you. Dell Technologies is a unique family of businesses that helps individuals and organizations transform how they work, live and play. Join us to build a future that works for everyone because Progress Takes All of Us. Application closing date: 30 Apr. 2024 Dell’s Flexible & Hybrid Work Culture At Dell Technologies, we believe our best work is done when flexibility is offered. We know that freedom and flexibility are crucial to all our employees no matter where you are located and our flexible and hybrid work style allows team members to have the freedom to ideate, be innovative, and drive results their way.
